AppPush.Title: [EN] [DANGER] IMMEDIATELY DISABLE MOBILE MODE IN GENSHIN AND HSR!
AppPush.Message:
Hi Collapse users!
HoYoverse has made it a bannable offense in GI (Co-op ban) to use Mobile Mode feature, so please DISABLE it immediately. We will work push an update to disable this feature in-code but so long you are seeing this message, DISABLE IT BEFORE OPENING THE GAME!

RegionPush.Title: [EN] Notice about Pre-Download Availability
RegionPush.Message:
Hi Travelers!
HoYoVerse has done some changes to the pre-download system, which resulted in the removal of ZIP archive for pre-download.
We have pushed an update to fix this issue, you should update your launcher to 1.83.0 to get the fix.
We are sorry for the inconvenience that this may have caused.

RegionPush.Title: [EN] Notice Regarding Sophon Pre-load/Update Issues
RegionPush.Message:
Hi Proxy!
We have acknowleged some issues might occur while you perform Pre-load or Update due to changes on the Sophon versioning.

A fix is underway and if you happen to have the fix ASAP, please download a test build from our Official Discord Server below. We are sorry for the inconvenience.
